TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit QueryableFilterRepeater extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.DynamicData.IFilterExpressionProvider
Public Class QueryableFilterRepeater Inherits Control Implements IFilterExpressionProvider
type QueryableFilterRepeater = class inherit Control interface IFilterExpressionProvider

summary.span: 提供樣板化控制項，此控制項可自動產生 UI 來篩選所支援資料行類型的資料表資料列。

span.span: Provides a templated control that automatically generates the UI to filter table rows for supported column types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [類別內容Class Context](#ClassContext) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項用於在網頁標記中自動產生 UI 來篩選資料表的資料列。The control is used in page markup to automatically generate the UI to filter table rows. 根據預設，動態資料會建立每個支援的資料行類型的 UI 使用 ~\DynamicData\Filters 目錄中的預設篩選器範本。By default, Dynamic Data creates the UI for each supported column type by using the default filter templates that are in the ~\DynamicData\Filters directory. 預設範本支援外部索引鍵、 Boolean 和列舉型別資料行類型。The default templates support foreign-key, Boolean, and enumeration column types. 下表列出相關聯的工作型別。The following table lists tasks that are associated with the type. |工作Task|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |建立篩選資料表的資料列的 UI。Create the UI for filtering table rows.|新增控制項來建立 UI 使用屬性。Add controls to create UI using the property.| |請確認是否控制項包含資料欄位篩選。Verify whether the control contains data field filters.|執行簽入方法。Perform the check in the method.| ## 類別內容Class Context 控制項設計用於搭配控制項。The control is designed to work with the control. 它必須參考內執行個體在網頁標記中的物件。It must be referenced by a instance inside a object in page markup. 下圖顯示以實作自動資料表資料列篩選的動態資料應該遵循的步驟。The following figure shows the steps that Dynamic Data follows in order to implement automatic table row filtering. ![動態資料的資料表資料列篩選項目](~/add/media/dynamic-autofilter.png "動態資料的資料表資料列篩選項目")![Dynamic Data Table Row Filtering Elements](~/add/media/dynamic-autofilter.png "Dynamic Data Table Row Filtering Elements") 1. 控制項 (其中包含在控制項)，傳遞的資料行值控制項。The controls (which are contained in the control), pass a column value to the control. 2. 控制項使用這個值來建立查詢篩選資訊，然後將傳遞至資料來源控制項。The control uses this value to create the query filtering information, which it then passes to the data source control. 3. 資料來源控制項將傳遞查詢篩選資料來源提供者的資訊。The data source control passes the query filtering information to the data source provider. 4. 資料來源提供者會將查詢傳遞至資料庫。The data source provider passes the query to the database. 5. 資料庫會傳回已篩選的資料表資料列。The database returns the filtered table rows. 6. 資料來源提供者會將此資料傳送回資料來源控制項。The data source provider sends this data back to the data source control. 7. 這個控制項將篩選的資料表的資料列傳遞至顯示的資料繫結控制項中。This control passes the filtered table rows to the data-bound control for display. ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples Visual Studio 專案的原始程式碼位於此位置： [Scaffolding 動態資料](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=168914)。A Visual Studio project with source code is available at this location: [Scaffolding Dynamic Data](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=168914). 下列範例示範如何使用產生資料表資料列篩選的 UI 控制項。The following example shows how to use the control to generate the UI for table row filtering. 重複項的項目範本包含每個所建立的 UI 控制項支援的資料行類型。The repeater's item template contains a control that creates the UI for each supported column type. 這個範例需要下列項目：The example requires the following: - 動態資料站台或 Dynamic Data Web 應用程式。A Dynamic Data Web site or a Dynamic Data Web application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱`Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site using Scaffolding`。For more information, see `Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site using Scaffolding`. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.dynamicdata.queryablefilterrepeater/cs/queryablefilterrepeater.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.dynamicdata.queryablefilterrepeater/vb/queryablefilterrepeater.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.dynamicdata.queryablefilterrepeater/cs/queryablefilterrepeater.aspx.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.dynamicdata.queryablefilterrepeater/vb/queryablefilterrepeater.aspx.vb#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.dynamicdata.queryablefilterrepeater/cs/awltl2spartials.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.dynamicdata.queryablefilterrepeater/vb/awltpartiall2sclasses.vb#4)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常您不會使用這個建構函式來初始化的新執行個體類別。Typically you do not use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 相反地，您指定在網頁標記中的控制項和控制項時，會初始化自動執行網頁時。Instead, you specify the control in page markup, and the control is initialized automatically when the page runs.

summary.span: 取得或設定範本內的 控制項 ID，該範本已設定為資料行的篩選。

span.span: Gets or sets the ID of a control inside the template that is configured to be a filter for a column.

value.span: 範本內的 控制項 ID，該範本已設定為資料行的篩選。

span.span: The ID of a control inside the template that is configured to be a filter for a column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未設定的識別碼，識別碼的預設值為"DynamicFilter"。If the ID is not set, the default value for the ID is "DynamicFilter".

summary.span: 取得或設定填入 類別的控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets the controls that populate the class.

value.span: 定義 控制項中項目顯示方式的物件。

span.span: An object that defines how items in the control are displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會定義用來填入行為子控制項的控制項。The property defines the behavior that is used to populate the control with child controls. 子控制項表示網頁所定義的內嵌樣板。The child controls represent the inline templates that are defined on the page. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定控制項的屬性，使其包含每個建立的 UI 控制項支援的資料行類型。The following example shows how to set the control's property so that it contains controls to create the UI for each supported column type. summary.span: 確認控制項是否包含資料欄位篩選。

span.span: Verifies whether the control contains data field filters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不有任何資料欄位篩選，這個方法會設定的屬性物件到`false`。If there are no data field filters, this method sets the property of the object to `false`. 這個方法之後呼叫控制項已載入，但它轉譯之前。This method is called after the control is loaded but before it is rendered.

summary.span: 取得使用目前的篩選值所修改的查詢。

span.span: Gets the modified query using the current filter value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
